text: Do you share your bedroom with a partner?
If yes, do they snore or disturb your sleep?
Do you have young children or infants at home?
If yes, how often do they wake you up per night?
What is your current employment status? (Full-time/Part-time/Shift work/Unemployed/Retired/Student)
Do you work shifts or irregular hours? (Yes/No)
How many hours per day do you spend looking at screens for work?
On a scale of 1-10, how would you rate your current work-related stress?
How many times per month do you travel for work or personal reasons?
Do you frequently cross time zones (>2 hours)? (Never/Rarely/Sometimes/Often)
Do you have caregiving responsibilities?
Do you have a bed partner or room mate?
Do you have diabetes or pre-diabetes?
Do you have high blood pressure?
Are you currently taking any prescription medications? (Yes/No)
Are you currently taking any supplements or vitamins? (Yes/No)
Do you have any diagnosed chronic medical conditions? (Yes/No)
Have you had any surgeries or medical procedures in the past 6 months? (Yes/No)
For women: Are you currently pregnant? (Yes/No/Not applicable)
For women: Are you currently breastfeeding? (Yes/No/Not applicable)
Do you use recreational drugs or cannabis? (Never/Rarely/Sometimes/Regularly/Prefer not to answer)
How often do you feel refreshed after sleep? (Never/Rarely/Sometimes/Often/Always)
How many times do you typically wake up during the night?
When you wake up at night, what is the MAIN reason? (Bathroom/Pain/Stress-Worry/Temperature/Noise/Unknown/Other)
How long does it typically take you to fall back asleep after waking? (minutes)
When have you usually gone to bed at night?
How long to fall asleep each night? (minutes)
When have you usually gotten up in the morning?
How many hours of actual sleep did you get?
How long does it take you to fall asleep? (minutes)
Do you use an alarm clock on weekdays?
How often do you get morning sunlight exposure?
What time do you usually turn off screens before bed? (HH:MM)
Do you use blue light filters or glasses?
What is the typical temperature in your bedroom at night?
How would you rate the noise level in your sleep environment? (1=Very quiet, 5=Very noisy)
How dark is your bedroom at night? (1=Completely dark, 5=Very bright)
Do you use any sleep aids? (White noise, fan, humidifier, air purifier, blackout curtains, etc.)
Do you consume caffeine?
If yes, how many cups per day?
Do you consume alcohol?
If yes, drinks per week?
What time do you typically eat your last meal of the day?
How many hours before bed do you typically finish eating?
What time do you typically have your last caffeinated beverage?
How many servings of fruits and vegetables do you eat per day on average? (one serving is one apple or a cup of berries, etc.)
Do you skip breakfast regularly? (Yes/No)
